message: Phase 2 Implementation has critical SQL error preventing dashboard from working

data.root_cause: SQL query references created_at column which doesn't exist in agents table schema
data.table_schema: agents table has started_at but not created_at column
data.impact: Dashboard crashes with 500 error when trying to fetch agent data

evidence.api_test: curl http://localhost:8000/api/agents/TASK-20260105-061230-b7fda08b returns 500 with 'no such column: created_at'
